text: To live is the rarest thing in the world. Most people exist.
author: Oscar Wilde

text: -unless I am myself, I am nobody.
author: Virginia Woolf

text: I would rather die of passion than boredom.
author: Van Gogh

text: The worse enemy to creativity is self-doubt.
author: Sylvia Plath

text: We loved with a love that was more than love.
author: Edgar Allan Poe

text: I was quiet, but I was not blind.
author: Jane Austen

text: Simplicity is the soul of efficiency.
author: Austin Freeman

text: The world only exists in your eyes. You can make it as big or as small as you want.
author: F. Scott Fitzgerald

text: It is no bad thing to celebrate a simple life.
author: J.R.R Tolkien

text: Maybe its's not about happy endings. Maybe it's about the stories.'
author: Albert Camus
